{{Wireless embedded system |brand=GL.iNet |model=GL-AR150 |asin=B01FJ4S9JK,B015CYI8DY |newegg=9SIAFN274K0164 |price=27 |est_release_date=09/2015 |is_manuf=No |type=3G mobile router, travel router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331;AR9331-AL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Elixir |ram1_model=N2DS51216DS-5T |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331;AR9331-AL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.49;OpenWrt Barrier Breaker; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, Gargoyle |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid_regex=^GL-iNet-[0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.8.1 |oui=E4:95:6E |oui_eth=E4:95:6E }} {{TagLine|150N Mini Smart Router}} [[File:ar150_shop.jpg|600px]]
==Official Supports== :{{ProductPage|http://www.gl-inet.com/ar150/}} :[https://store.gl-inet.com/collections/travel-routers/products/gl-ar150-mini-smart-router Official Shop] :[https://forum.gl-inet.com Official Forum]
==Features== * Powered by [[Atheros]] AR9331 WiSoC (@400MHz CPU) * 16MB Flash * 64MB RAM * 150Mbps high speed * OpenWrt pre-installed * 4x GPIOs for IoT development * External antenna optional support * Optional PoE support * Stable performance * Low power consumption * Small, light, easy to use
==Mentions== *[https://www.allaboutcircuits.com/news/teardown-tuesday-mini-network-router/ ''Teardown Tuesday: Mini Network Router''] By Robin Mitchell
